task.title: Stopping a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Stop a pipeline when you want the to stop processing data for the pipeline.

context.p: pipelinesstoppingWhen the runs a pipeline, it displays in the console in Monitor mode by default.

step.cmd: From the Home page, click the More icon for the pipeline and then click Stop. Or to stop a pipeline in the pipeline canvas, click the Stop icon.
step.info: The Stop Pipeline Confirmation dialog box appears.

step.cmd: To stop the pipeline, click Yes.
